DataElement.preferredName: Criterion Course One Allogeneic Hematopoietic Stem Cell Transplantation Fulfill Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A yes/no indicator to describe whether the patient met criteria to start the first allogeneic hematopoietic stem cell transplantation.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Criterion Course One Allogeneic Hematopoietic Stem Cell Transplantation Fulfill
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: That which constitutes a standard from which a judgment can be established, a reference point against which other things can be evaluated, or a basis for comparison._Passage through time; duration; a systematic or/and orderly succession; a sequence, e.g. course of treatment; a mode of action or behavior; natural development, typical manner of proceeding._The smallest natural number and quantity it denotes: a single entity, unit, or object._Taken from different individuals of the same species._Primitive blood cells derived from embryonic mesenchyme capable of differentiating into any of the blood cell line progenitor cells (erythroblasts, young granulocytic series cells, megakaryocytes, etc.)_Transference of a tissue or organ within an individual, between individuals of the same species, or between individuals of different species._Satisfy the requirements or expectations of.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: That which constitutes a standard from which a judgment can be established, a reference point against which other things can be evaluated, or a basis for comparison.

Concepts.definition: That which constitutes a standard from which a judgment can be established, a reference point against which other things can be evaluated, or a basis for comparison.

Property.preferredName: Course One Allogeneic Hematopoietic Stem Cell Transplantation Fulfill
Property.preferredDefinition: Passage through time; duration; a systematic or/and orderly succession; a sequence, e.g. course of treatment; a mode of action or behavior; natural development, typical manner of proceeding.:The smallest natural number and quantity it denotes: a single entity, unit, or object.:Taken from different individuals of the same species.:Primitive blood cells derived from embryonic mesenchyme capable of differentiating into any of the blood cell line progenitor cells (erythroblasts, young granulocytic series cells, megakaryocytes, etc.):Transference of a tissue or organ within an individual, between individuals of the same species, or between individuals of different species.:Satisfy the requirements or expectations of.

Concepts.definition: Passage through time; duration; a systematic or/and orderly succession; a sequence, e.g. course of treatment; a mode of action or behavior; natural development, typical manner of proceeding.
The smallest natural number and quantity it denotes: a single entity, unit, or object.
Taken from different individuals of the same species.

Primitive blood cells derived from embryonic mesenchyme capable of differentiating into any of the blood cell line progenitor cells (erythroblasts, young granulocytic series cells, megakaryocytes, etc.)
Transference of a tissue or organ within an individual, between individuals of the same species, or between individuals of different species.
Satisfy the requirements or expectations of.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).
